name: Sit to Stand
instruction: Child rises from a sitting position to standing without assistance.

criteria_0_to_3.0: Cannot initiate or complete the movement.
criteria_0_to_3.1: Initiates movement but requires significant support or stops early.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Completes movement with compensations or minor support.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Stands fully without hand support or compensations.

name: Run 10m
instruction: Child runs 10 meters at a steady pace.

criteria_0_to_3.0: Unable to run or cannot complete the distance.
criteria_0_to_3.1: Runs with major deviations, very slow, or stops frequently.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Runs with minor deviations or reduced speed.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Runs with clear flight phase and stable rhythm.

name: Jump forward
instruction: Child jumps forward using both feet.

criteria_0_to_3.1: Minimal jump with significant asymmetry or loss of balance.
criteria_0_to_3.2: Jump with partial symmetry or unstable landing.
criteria_0_to_3.3: Symmetrical jump with clear flight phase and stable landing.
